}

	padding-top: 95%;
}

	font-weight: 600;
}

	font-weight: 200 !important;
}

	border-bottom: 1px solid #6B717A;
}

	border-top: 1px solid #6B717A;

	border-bottom: 1px solid #D2D6DF;
    width: 40px;
}

/* Buttons */
.mktg-btn-responsive {
	width: 100%;
}

/* Overrides main mktg button style */
.mktg-btn {
	padding: 10px 20px !important;
	font-weight: 600;
}

.mktg-btn-shadow {
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(63,16,1,0.25);

    box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(63,16,1,0.25);
}

a,

	color: #ffa71a;
}

}

	color: #fff  !important;
}

.mktg-link-white-music:hover {
	color: #ffa71a  !important;
}

/* Styles for dark navigation bar */
/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
/* This style overrides the navigation bg color and text color */
.minor, .global-header, .major {
	color: #fff;
	background-color: #282C35 !important;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #363A43 !important;
}

/* This style overrides the logo color and turns it to white */
.eb-logo:link i, .eb-logo:visited i, .eb-logo:hover i, .eb-logo:focus i, .eb-logo:active i {
	color: #fff !important;
}

/* This overrides the header link bg color and link colors */
.header-link {
	border-left: 1px solid #363A43 !important;
	background-color: #282C35 !important;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #363A43 !important;
	color: #fff !important;
}

.header-link:hover {
	color: #ffa71a !important;
}

/* This overrides the active state/click background being white */
body .global-header .list a:active, body .global-header .list a.ui-state-active {
    background-color: #282C35 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
}

/* This overrides the padding for the hamburger menu so it doesn't break out of the nav bar */
.mktg-menu {
	padding-top: 18px !important;
	padding-bottom: 18px !important;
}

/* This overrides the background color and text color on hover inside the dropdown menu*/
body .global-header .list a:hover, body .global-header .list a.ui-state-hover {
    background-color: #282C35;
    color: #ffa71a !important;
}

body .global-header .list {
    outline: 1px solid #363A43 !important;
    background-color: #282C35 !important;
}

/* This overrides the text color in the dropdown menu */
body .global-header .list li a {
	color: #fff !important;
}

/* This overrides the bottom border inside the dropdown menu */
body .global-header .list .list--with-divider-top, body .global-header .list .list--with-divider-bottom {
    border-color: #363A43;
}

.btn i, .chart-panel__button i {
    vertical-align: 0px;
}

/* These styles help with the color and positioning of the opacity signup box */
/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
/* This is the grey-900 background color with a 90% opacity */
.mktg-bg-opacity-900 {
	background-color: rgba(40,44,53,.95);
}

.mktg-bg-opacity-800 {
	background-color: rgba(54,58,67,.95);
}

.mktg-music-hero {
	position: relative;
}

.mktg-bg-gradient-blue-90 {
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,.95) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.95) 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(left top, right top, color-stop(0%, rgba(0,113,154,.95)), color-stop(100%, rgba(0,255,247,0.9)));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,.95) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.95) 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,.95) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.95) 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,.95) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.95) 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0,113,154,.95) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0..95) 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#00719a', endColorstr='#00fff7', GradientType=1 );
}

	position: relative;
    margin-top: -180px;
}

}

.mktg-music-form-footer {
	position: relative;
	margin-bottom: -110px;
}

.mktg-music-footer-form-bg {
	border-radius: 2px;
	background: rgba(54,58,67,1);
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(54,58,67,1) 0%, rgba(54,58,67,.97) 100%);
	background: -webkit-gradient(left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(54,58,67,1)), color-stop(0%, rgba(54,58,67,.97)));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(54,58,67,1) 0%, rgba(54,58,67,.97) 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(54,58,67,1) 0%, rgba(54,58,67,.97) 100%);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(54,58,67,1) 0%, rgba(54,58,67,.97) 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(54,58,67,1) 0%, rgba(54,58,67,.97) 100%);
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#363a43', endColorstr='#363a43', GradientType=0 );
}

/* Flexbox product alignment */
/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
.mktg-device-left-align-bleed {
	display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
}

/* Masonry in case study section */
/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
.mktg-masonry-inner-container-music {
	column-count: 2;
    -moz-column-count: 2;
    -webkit-column-count: 2;
    column-gap: 24px;
    -moz-column-gap: 24px;
    -webkit-column-gap: 24px;
    column-fill: balance;
    -moz-column-fill: balance;
    -webkit-column-fill: balance;
    width: 100%;
}

.mktg-bleed-txt-marg {
	margin: 0 5%;
}

.mktg-img-bleed {
	max-height: 80vh;
}

.venue-logo {
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    text-indent: -9999em;
    background-image: url(https://s3.amazonaws.com/eventbrite-s3/marketing/landingpages/eb_music_microsite/venue_logo.png);
    background-image: url(https://s3.amazonaws.com/eventbrite-s3/marketing/landingpages/eb_music_microsite/venue_logo.svg);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center bottom;
    max-width: 315px;
    margin: auto;
}

/* Gradient Hover */
/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
figure {
	margin: 0;
}

figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect figcaption::before {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,1) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.9) 100%);
	background: -webkit-gradient(left top, right top, color-stop(0%, rgba(0,113,154,1)), color-stop(100%, rgba(0,255,247,0.9)));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,1) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.9) 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,1) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.9) 100%);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(0,113,154,1) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.9) 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0,113,154,1) 0%, rgba(0,255,247,0.9) 100%);
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#00719a', endColorstr='#00fff7', GradientType=1 );
	content: '';
	opacity: 0;
}

figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect i {
	position: absolute;
	top: 54%;
	left: 0;
	width: 100%;
	color: #fff;
	-webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.35s, color 0.35s;
	transition: transform 0.35s, color 0.35s;
	-webkit-transform: translate3d(0,-90%,0);
	transform: translate3d(0,-90%,0);
}

figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect figcaption::before,
figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect p {
	-webkit-transition: opacity 0.35s, -webkit-transform 0.35s;
	transition: opacity 0.35s, transform 0.35s;
}

figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect p {
	position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    padding: 2em;
    width: 40%;
    opacity: 0;
    text-align: left;
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0,5px,0);
    transform: translate3d(0,5px,0);
}

figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect:hover i {
	color: #fff;
	-webkit-transform: translate3d(0,-50%,0) translate3d(0,-40px,0);
	transform: translate3d(0,-50%,0) translate3d(0,-40px,0);
}

figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect:hover figcaption::before ,
figure.mktg-gradient-b-effect:hover p {
	opacity: 1;
	-webkit-transform: translate3d(0,0,0);
	transform: translate3d(0,0,0);
}

/* Lightbox styles */
.mfp-content{
	max-width: 900px
}
.default-mfp-close {
    color: #fff;
    opacity: 1;
    text-align: right;
}
#modal-player{
	padding: 0px;
    height: 0;
    padding-bottom: 56.25%;
}
#player{
	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

<div class="mktg-l-block--padded-v-80 mktg-dial-bg eds-bg-color--grey-900">
	<div class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-10-12 eds-g-offset-1-12">
		<div class="eds-g-grid">
			<div class="eds-g-group">
				<div class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-12-12 eds-g-offset-0-12 eds-g-cell-md-8-12 eds-g-offset-md-2-12 eds-g-cell-lw-6-12 eds-g-offset-lw-3-12">
		            <h2 class="eds-text-hm eds-text-color--white eds-text--center">Eventbrite Venue streamlines your workflow in one interface with one login</h2>
		        </div>
		        <div class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-12-12 eds-g-offset-0-12 eds-g-cell-md-12-12 eds-g-offset-md-0-12 eds-g-cell-lw-12-12 eds-g-offset-lw-0-12 mktg-l-block--padded-v-40">
		            <ul class="eds-l-mar-top-6 eds-g-group">
		                <li class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-1-1 eds-g-offset-md-1-12 eds-g-cell-md-4-12 eds-g-offset-lw-2-12 eds-g-cell-lw-3-12 eds-l-mar-top-3 eds-l-pad-all-3 mktg-text-center--mobile">
			  				<p class="eds-text-hs eds-text-color--white mktg-text-light"><a href="#booking" class="mktg-link-orange">Booking, Announce Date, and On-Sale</a></p>
		  					<div class="mktg-border-40 eds-l-pad-bot-6"></div>
		  					<div class="eds-l-mar-top-6">
		  						<p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Save time by streamlining your booking and ticketing operations in one interface.</p>
		  					</div>
		  					<div class="eds-l-mar-top-6">
		  						<p class="eds-text-bm eds-text-color--white">Interested in our booking tool only? <a class="mktg-link-orange" href="https://www.eventbrite.com/l/contact-eventbrite-music/" target="_blank">Contact us</a> for details.</p>
		  					</div>	
		  				</li>
		  				<li class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-1-1 eds-g-offset-md-3-12 eds-g-cell-md-4-12 eds-g-offset-lw-2-12 eds-g-cell-lw-3-12 eds-l-mar-top-3 eds-l-pad-all-3 mktg-text-center--mobile">
			  				<p class="eds-text-hs eds-text-color--white mktg-text-light"><a href="#ticketing" class="mktg-link-orange">Ticketing and Promotion</a></p>
		  					<div class="mktg-border-40 eds-l-pad-bot-6"></div>
		  					<div class="eds-l-mar-top-6">
		  						<p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Reach fans where they find shows and convert them quickly</p>
		  					</div>			
		  				</li>
		  				<li class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-1-1 eds-g-offset-md-1-12 eds-g-cell-md-4-12 eds-g-offset-lw-2-12 eds-g-cell-lw-3-12 eds-l-mar-top-6 eds-l-pad-all-3 mktg-text-center--mobile">
			  				<p class="eds-text-hs eds-text-color--white mktg-text-light"><a href="#settlement" class="mktg-link-orange">Settlement and Analysis</a></p>
		  					<div class="mktg-border-40 eds-l-pad-bot-6"></div>
		  					<div class="eds-l-mar-top-6">
		  						<p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Stay in control with real-time ticket counts and sales data in your pocket.</p>
		  					</div>
		  				</li>
		  				<li class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-1-1 eds-g-offset-md-3-12 eds-g-cell-md-4-12 eds-g-offset-lw-2-12 eds-g-cell-lw-3-12 eds-l-mar-top-6 eds-l-pad-all-3 mktg-text-center--mobile">
			  				<p class="eds-text-hs eds-text-color--white mktg-text-light"><a href="#production" class="mktg-link-orange">Production and Check-In</a></p>

		  					<div class="eds-l-mar-top-6">
		  						<p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Scan and sell tickets faster to get fans and guests in and to the bar.</p>
		  					</div>	
		  				</li>
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<!-- Product sections 1 & 2 with supercrop bg -->

<!-- Product sections 1 Right Aligned image and text -->

        </div>
        <div class="eds-g-cell-1-1 eds-g-cell-md-1-2 eds-g-cell-lg-1-2 eds-l-sn-mar-top-6 eds-l-sm-mar-top-6 eds-g-offset-md-1-12 eds-l-md-pad-right-6 eds-l-mw-pad-right-6 eds-l-ln-pad-right-6 eds-l-lg-pad-right-6 eds-l-lw-pad-right-6">
            <div class="eds-l-sw-mar-hor-6 eds-l-mn-mar-hor-6 eds-l-md-mar-right-6 eds-l-mw-mar-right-6 eds-l-ln-mar-right-6 eds-l-lg-mar-right-6 eds-l-lw-mar-right-6">
                <h3 class="eds-text-hm eds-text-color--white">Save time by streamlining your booking and ticketing operations in one interface</h3>
	            <div class="eds-l-mar-top-6">
	                <p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Booking calendar for holds and confirmed shows</p>
	            </div>
	            <div class="eds-l-mar-top-4">
	                <p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Central storage for offer sheets, stage plots, and artist riders</p>
	            </div>
	            <div class="eds-l-mar-top-4">
	                <p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Flexible access levels for staff</p>
	            </div>
	            <div class="eds-l-mar-top-4">
	                <p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">Ticket setup with automated announcements and on-sales in two simple steps</p>
	            </div>
	            <div class="eds-l-mar-top-4">
	                <p class="eds-text-bm eds-text-color--white">Interested in our booking tool only? <a class="mktg-link-orange" href="https://www.eventbrite.com/l/contact-eventbrite-music/" target="_blank">Contact us</a> for details.</p>
	            </div> 
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
<!-- END: Product sections 1 Left Aligned image and text -->

            </div>

                <p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">The simplest purchase flow in the industry — no user account, captcha, or login required</p>

            </div>
            <div class="eds-l-mar-top-4">
                <p class="eds-text-bl eds-text-color--white">50M+ active ticket buyers on Eventbrite — and more on Spotify, Bandsintown, Songkick, and more</p>

    </div>

</section>

<!-- Customer Quote section -->
<section class="eds-bg-color--grey-900 mktg-l-block--padded-v-80">
	<div class="eds-g-grid">
		<div class="eds-g-group">
			<div class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-12-12 eds-g-offset-0-12 eds-g-cell-md-8-12 eds-g-offset-md-2-12">

		    </div>

<!-- Partner logos section -->
<section class="eds-bg-color--grey-900">
	<div class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-10-12 eds-g-offset-1-12">
		<div class="eds-g-grid">
		<div class="mktg-border-bottom--grey-600 eds-l-pad-bot-1 eds-l-sn-mar-hor-6 eds-l-sm-mar-hor-6 eds-l-sw-mar-hor-6 eds-l-mn-mar-hor-6">
			<p class="eds-text-bm label-primary eds-l-pad-top-3 eds-text-color--grey-600 eds-text--center">MORE PARTNERS</p>
		</div>
		<ul class="eds-g-group eds-l-mar-vert-2">
			<li class="eds-text--center eds-l-mar-top-2 eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-4-12 eds-g-cell-md-2-12">
				<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/eventbrite-s3/marketing/landingpages/eb_music_microsite/gamh_logo.png" class="g-img">

			</li>
			<li class="eds-text--center eds-l-mar-top-2 eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-4-12 eds-g-cell-md-2-12">
				<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/eventbrite-s3/marketing/landingpages/eb_music_microsite/tankroom_logo.png" class="g-img">
			</li>
			<li class="eds-text--center eds-l-mar-top-2 eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-4-12 eds-g-cell-md-2-12">
				<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/eventbrite-s3/marketing/landingpages/eb_music_microsite/mezzanine_logo.png" class="g-img">
			</li>

			</li>
			<li class="eds-text--center eds-l-mar-top-2 eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-4-12 eds-g-cell-md-2-12">
				<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/eventbrite-s3/marketing/landingpages/eb_music_microsite/recordbar_logo.png" class="g-img">

				<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/eventbrite-s3/marketing/landingpages/eb_music_microsite/lizardlounge_logo.png" class="g-img">

		</div>
	</div>
</section>


<!-- Footer SignUp Box -->
<section class="eds-bg-color--grey-900 mktg-l-block--padded-v-top-80">
	<div class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-12-12 eds-g-offset-0-12 eds-g-cell-md-10-12 eds-g-offset-md-1-12 eds-g-cell-lg-8-12 eds-g-offset-lg-2-12 mktg-music-form-footer eds-l-pad-hor-3">
		<div class="mktg-music-footer-form-bg mktg-l-block--padded-v-40">
			<div class="eds-g-grid">
		        <div class="eds-g-cell eds-g-cell-12-12 eds-g-offset-0-12 eds-l-pad-hor-3 eds-g-cell-md-12-12 eds-g-offset-md-0-12">
		            <h1 class="eds-text-hm eds-text-color--white eds-text--center">Ready to grow your room into an iconic music venue?</h1>
		            <div class="eds-l-mar-top-6">
		  				<a href="https://www.eventbrite.com/l/contact-eventbrite-music" target="_blank"><button class="mktg-btn eds-align--center" type="button">Get started</button></a>
					</div>

		    </div>
	    </div>

<section class="mktg-landing-footer-home mktg-music-footer mktg-landing-cover">

<!-- Munchkin -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	jQuery.ajax({
		url: '//munchkin.marketo.net/munchkin.js',
		dataType: 'script',
		cache: true,
		success: function(){
			Munchkin.init('269-CEG-133');
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- CE --> 
<script type="text/javascript">
setTimeout(function()
{var a=document.createElement("script"); var b=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; a.src=document.location.protocol+"//script.crazyegg.com/pages/scripts/0047/7928.js?"+Math.floor(new Date().getTime()/3600000); a.async=true;a.type="text/javascript";b.parentNode.insertBefore(a,b)}
, 1);
</script>

<!-- javascript -->

<script type="text/javascript">


    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
    	$('.js-d-modal').on('mfpOpen', function(){
    		createPlayer()
    	})
    	$('.js-d-modal').on('mfpClose', function(){
    		player.destroy();
    	})

    });

	var player;
	function createPlayer() {
		player = new YT.Player('player', {
			height: '500',
			width: '900',
			videoId: 'sqkGqOSlZgQ',
			playerVars: {
				'enablejsapi': 1,
				'autoplay': 1,
			},
			events: {
				'onStateChange': onPlayerStateChange
			}
		});
	}

	function onPlayerStateChange(event) {
		switch( event.data ) {
			//Send video started event to Marketo
			case YT.PlayerState.PLAYING:
				console.log('start');
				Munchkin.munchkinFunction('visitWebPage', {
					url: '/video/sqkGqOSlZgQ',
					params: 'video=started'
					}
				);
				break;
			//Send video finished event to Marketo
			case YT.PlayerState.ENDED:
				console.log('end');
				Munchkin.munchkinFunction('visitWebPage', {
					url: '/video/sqkGqOSlZgQ',
					params: 'video=finished'
					}
				);
				break;
		}

	}


</script>

        </div>
    </div>


    </div>

<script src="//d2wy8f7a9ursnm.cloudfront.net/bugsnag-3.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    if (window.Bugsnag) {
        Bugsnag.apiKey = '85191ee1208c343458906f7573d09a18';
        Bugsnag.appVersion = "12878-rc2017-08-30_16.04-0b80fd9";
        Bugsnag.context = "core-^.*/";

        var _onload = function(){
            if (document.readyState && !/loaded|complete/.test(document.readyState)){setTimeout(_onload, 10);return}
            if (!window.__adroll_loaded){__adroll_loaded=true;setTimeout(_onload, 50);return}
            var scr = document.createElement("script");
            var host = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://s.adroll.com" : "http://a.adroll.com");
            scr.setAttribute('async', 'true');
            scr.type = "text/javascript";
            scr.src = host + "/j/roundtrip.js";
            ((document.getElementsByTagName('head') || [null])[0] ||
                document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0].parentNode).appendChild(scr);
        };
        if (window.addEventListener) {window.addEventListener('load', _onload, false);}
        else {window.attachEvent('onload', _onload)}
    }());

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8" crossorigin="anonymous">// Console-polyfill. MIT license.
// https://github.com/paulmillr/console-polyfill
// Make it safe to do console.log() always.
(function(global) {
  'use strict';
  global.console = global.console || {};
  var con = global.console;
  var prop, method;
  var empty = {};
  var dummy = function() {};
  var properties = 'memory'.split(',');
  var methods = ('assert,clear,count,debug,dir,dirxml,error,exception,group,' +
     'groupCollapsed,groupEnd,info,log,markTimeline,profile,profiles,profileEnd,' +
     'show,table,time,timeEnd,timeline,timelineEnd,timeStamp,trace,warn').split(',');
  while (prop = properties.pop()) if (!con[prop]) con[prop] = empty;
  while (method = methods.pop()) if (!con[method]) con[method] = dummy;
})(typeof window === 'undefined' ? this : window);
// Using `this` for web workers while maintaining compatibility with browser
// targeted script loaders such as Browserify or Webpack where the only way to
// get to the global object is via `window`.
</script>

        var _mTrack = _mTrack || [];
        _mTrack.push(['trackPage']);

        { var mClientId = '8095t6t28384'; var mProto = (('https:' == document.location.protocol) ?     <!-- begin marketo pixel -->
    
    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function() {
            var didInit = false;
            function initMunchkin() {
                if(didInit === false) {
                    didInit = true;
                    Munchkin.init('269-CEG-133');
                }
            }
            var s = document.createElement('script');
            s.type = 'text/javascript';
            s.async = true;
            s.src = 'https://munchkin.marketo.net/munchkin.js';
            s.onreadystatechange = function() {
                if (this.readyState == 'complete' || this.readyState == 'loaded') {
                    initMunchkin();
                }
            };
            s.onload = initMunchkin;
            document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(s);
        })();
    </script>

    <!-- end marketo pixel -->


    
    
    
    

        <script>
            // We want to track some custom dimensions on the event pages
            // For that, we first check if we are in an event page
            if (typeof(require) != 'undefined') {
                require(['mediatorjs', 'underscore', 'eb/analytics'], function(mediatorjs, _, Analytics) {
                    var isEvent = document.location.pathname.match('^/e\//*'),
                        isBaseDiscoPage = false,
                        cityBrowseExpVar = '',
                        isNewListing,
                        public_id,
                        eventOwnerUserId,
                        dimensions = {};

                    Analytics.setInternalUseGACookie();
                    Analytics.trackPendingInternalLink('ebEventToTrack');

                    dimensions['dimension14'] = null;
                    dimensions['dimension24'] = 'de57256e_8376d6a6055ccb2870400fad9fccfada888bd52fbe895417fd52fe68562d8b00bd41a993b1e519877f3b352544141a1c';

                    // TODO: move these dimensions to the event pages instead of checking on every page.
                    if(isEvent){

                        dimensions.dimension12 = public_id;
                        dimensions.dimension21 = isNewListing ? 'NewListing' : 'OldListing';


                        dimensions.dimension28 = eventOwnerUserId;
                    }

                    /* Temporary tracking addition while EXP_EB_60058_CITY_BROWSE is running */
                    if (isBaseDiscoPage && cityBrowseExpVar) {
                        dimensions.dimension21 = 'CityBrowseVariant' + cityBrowseExpVar;
                    }

                    dimensions.dimension23 = location.search

                    if (mediatorjs.get('GAPageviewDimensions')) {
                        dimensions = _.extend(dimensions, mediatorjs.get('GAPageviewDimensions'));
                    }
                    Analytics.trackPageView(dimensions);
                });
            } else {
                // This is for pages that don't have require (ie our widgets)
                ga('send', 'pageview');
            }
        </script>
        <script type="text/javascript">
        if (window.EB && window.EB.Analytics) {
            EB.Analytics.init(null);
        }
        </script>



</body>
</html>
